author: dims
msg: Reworked Patch from  Jens Schumann (jens@void.fm) which fixes for the following:
Bug 15494 - zero terminated java string serialize zero to XML
Bug 19327 - Character entities are escaped too aggressively
- Pluggable XMLEncoder component (see XMLEncoderFactory for details)
- Fixed memory allocation bugs in EncodedByteArray
- You can set the encoding in AxisEngine ("axis.xmlEncoding")
- Use XMLUnit (http://xmlunit.sf.net) to test if two xml's are equal (Don't compare them as strings).
- xmlunit1.0.jar is in test/lib directory. It uses a BSD License.

author: lilantha
msg: change and fix the inefficiency of the algo and overwriting strings

author: stevel
msg: i18n version of happyclient, plus build.xml task to run it. Are we feeling happy yet?

msg: converting special XML charactors to entity references when serializing is done
